title: Mrs Hinch shares snaps of decorated home after year of renovations and EVERY room is grey and white
text:
Cleaning aficionado Sophie Hinchliffe has given fans a glimpse of her completed white and grey home after nearly a year of renovations.

The TV personality, 29, from Essex, who goes by the name Mrs Hinch, first started sharing snippets of her stylish home developments last year in a series of photos on her Instagram page.

And now, the cleaning expert has revealed the last piece of the jigsaw- her completed dining room which features a stunning chandelier and a statement mirror propped against the wall.

Sophie Hinchliffe, 29, from Essex, has given fans a glimpse of her completed white and grey home in Essex which comes with a grey and white themed dining room

A step inside her the cleaning guru's living room reveals grey velvet sofas, a grey rug and a glass coffee table

In her most recent post Mrs Hinch shared a picture of the very first dining room she had ever owned alongside the caption: 'It still feels so strange for me to say my dining room because I've never had one before!

'But as you can see this room was once my lounge and I love the fact that it still feels cosy which is exactly what I wanted!

'I also wanted to take this chance to say thank you for tagging and sharing your Activity Journals with me! It's been so amazingly overwhelming guys and I can’t believe this is my second book to reach number one and it’s all because of you.

'I've loved seeing your hinchlists and I've ticked quite a few things off my list today and I'll be adding some more ready for the week ahead.'

The mother-of-one, who initially began running her account anonymously before finally revealing her identity on This Morning last year, added: 'I hope you all have the best cosy evening indoors, candles on, TV, sofa and blankets!

'Because that's exactly what we'll be doing! Lots of love and thank you for everything.'

Ensuring she maintained her white and grey colour scheme throughout her home, Mrs Hinch had her kitchen fitted with grey cabinets and a white worktop

Mrs Hinch added a touch of beauty to her kitchen by using a bouquet of white flowers inside a silver vase as her centrepiece

In another room, Mrs Hinch continued her grey and white colour scheme by purchasing a set of white drawers and cream curtains

Earlier this month, Mrs Hinch shared a glimpse of her stunning living room which is kitted out with velvet grey sofas and matching rug underneath a glass coffee table.

Taking to Instagram to share her delight at the transformation, the cleaning guru wrote: 'Happy October and welcome to my new lounge. This is my fave time of year! I love lighting my wax melts, putting on fleecy pjs and getting cosy with my boys on the sofa (or sofas now should I say) I still can't believe this is my lounge!'

The social media star, who is known for her love of the colour grey, continued her theme throughout her home.

A step inside her kitchen revealed a pristine white worktop teamed with grey cabinets while her bathroom showcased grey tiles and white-rimmed windows.

In another room, fans were greeted by a grey-themed bedroom that featured a fitted wardrobe and an eye-catching chandelier hanging from the ceiling.

The mother-of-one, who rose to fame on social media with her ingenious cleaning tips and interior design hacks, has now gathered more than 2.8million followers on her Instagram page.

The mother-of-one rose to fame on social media with her ingenious cleaning tips and interior design hacks

In another room Mrs Hinch used a pale grey carpet to cover her floor (left) and also showed off a glossy white dressing table (right)

Mrs Hinch showed her loved for the white and grey colour scheme in a series of pictures on social media

The cleaning expert, who first started sharing tips to her account when her husband Jamie began renovating their home, has continued her colour theme in her bedroom and bathroom

The cleaning expert first started sharing tips on her account when her husband Jamie began renovating their home, which they had bought two years previously.

Sophie's easy tips and spotless grey interiors fascinated the nation and beyond, and saw her rack up followers from across the globe.

Earlier this year, the social media star also saw the release of her debut book Hinch Yourself Happy: All The Best Cleaning Tips To Shine Your Sink And Soothe Your Soul.
description: Sophie Hinchliffe has given fans a glimpse of her completed white and grey home in Essex which comes complete with an eye-catching mirror propped on the wall and grey velvet sofas.
